markdownRemark.html: ZDNet is reporting Apple's update of their Macbook Pro line, and indeed, they are featured prominently at Apple.com. The big deal? Well for starters, the 15-incher has a backlit display, which is energy efficient and reportedly contains no mercury! That's pretty cool. And secondly, you can pop 4GB of memory in these bad boys. Huge for virtualization setups with Parallels and QEMU / Q / kju. Along the same lines, these books use the new centrino chips which feature virtualization technology, which is supported by Parallels.
